content.question: What is the slope of the line tangent to the graph of <math alttext="y equals, the fraction with numerator 4 times x cubed, and denominator x plus 3, end fraction" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>y</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>4</mn><msup><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>3</mn></mrow></msup></mrow><mrow><mi>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>3</mn></mrow></mfrac></mrow></mstyle></math> at <math alttext="x equals 1" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>x</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></mstyle></math> ?

skill.text: Skill 1.E: Apply appropriate mathematical rules or procedures, with and without technology.
